metadata.Title: CVE-2011-4606 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
Artsoft Entertainment Rocks'n'Diamonds (aka rocksndiamonds) 3.3.0.1 allowslocal users to overwrite arbitrary files via a symlink attack on.rocksndiamonds/cache/artworkinfo.cache under a user's home directory.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2011-4606` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

rocksndiamonds - 3.3.0.1+dfsg1-2.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: rocksndiamonds package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.3.0.1+dfsg1-2.2').
